mapper.insert: insert into oms_order ( member_id, shop_id, order_sn, create_time, member_username, pay_amount, status, order_status ) values( #{memberId}, #{shopId}, #{orderSn}, #{createTime}, #{memberUsername}, #{payAmount}, #{status}, #{orderStatus} )

insert into oms_order_item ( product_id, order_sn, product_name, product_pic, product_price, product_quantity, order_id ) values ( #{productId}, #{orderSn}, #{productName}, #{productPic}, #{productPrice}, #{productQuantity}, #{orderId} )

insert into ums_integration_change_history ( member_id, shop_id, create_time, change_type, change_count, operate_man ) values ( #{memberId}, #{shopId}, #{createTime}, #{changeType}, #{changeCount}, #{operateMan} )
mapper.select: select id pmsId,shop_id shopId,username,pic,price,publish_status publishStatus,description from pms_product where id = #{productId} and publish_status = 1
select username from ums_member where id = #{memberId}
